sect3.title: "array" and "callable" alias name
sect3.simpara: It is no longer possible to use "array" and "callable" as class alias names in class_alias

sect3.title: Loosely comparing uncomparable objects
sect3.simpara: Loosely comparing uncomparable objects (e.g. enums, \CurlHandle and other internal classes) to booleans was previously inconsistent. If compared to a boolean literal $object == true, it would behave the same way as (bool) $object. If compared to a statically unknown value $object == $true, it would always return false. This behavior was consolidated to always follow the behavior of (bool) $object.
